events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund because the customer is asking for their money back due to receiving an incorrect item.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in refund and return issues.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong product and want to get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Thanks for your response. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a picture showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
We have reviewed your order and the photo you sent. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick resolution! I appreciate how promptly you are handling my refund request.
Your refund has been successfully processed and you should see the amount credited back to your account shortly.
Just checking in to ensure the refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if anything else is needed.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us, and please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short customer satisfaction survey to gather feedback about your recent support experience.
